t_audio_discussion_question_1::clip_card: Ask: What is your opinion of the individual?
Record sound of the place where you asked about the individual.
t_audio_discussion_question_1::title: What is your opinion of the person?
t_audio_discussion_question_1::clip_card: Ask: What is your opinion of the individual?
Ask: What is your opinion of the individual?
t_audio_discussion_question_1::text_card: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template asks many people to give their opinion of a specific individual. Discussions work well for gathering opinions about a character with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
t_audio_discussion_question_1::clip_card: Record sound of a place important to your character.
t_audio_discussion_question_1::text_card: You may want to substitute the name of the individual you are focused on where you see \“the individual.\”
t_audio_discussion_question_1::clip_card: Ask: What is your opinion of the individual?
Record sound that introduces your discussion.
Ask: What is your opinion of the individual?
